name: Social Media Beast
description:
CHICAGO'S SOCIAL-CENTRIC DIGITAL AGENCY
Social Media Beast is a Chicago-based digital marketing agency. We help our clients succeed by building creative, innovative digital campaigns around a dynamic social media presence. Our clients include some of Chicago’s most recognizable institutions like Navy Pier, Carnivale and United Auto Insurance.
We started our agency in 2010, right as social media agencies were first beginning. Our full-service digital agency is built around a core staff of social content writers and strategists, producing outstanding content for our clients, monitoring interactions and reaching out to online influencers.
All our other agency services complement and enhance our social content. Our other agency services include digital advertising (social, search and display), email marketing automation, and SEO.
We want to see your business succeed. Your goals are our goals, and your returns are our returns. We want to help set you up with a loyal following of people who love your brand, and can’t wait to hear about your latest offerings and promotions. We want to see you get the leads and returns that are going to drive your business forward.
At Social Media Beast, we take on your business goals and your brand voice as our own. We serve you as a powerful extension of your marketing team that feels like it’s been in place for years. That’s our promise to you.
